charges.charge_description: 18:371.F and 3551 et seq. CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft was found guilty on counts 1,2 after a plea of not guilty. Deft Elizabeth Sanders is hereby placed on probation for a term of 1 year on counts 1,2 concurrent. Special Conditions of Probation: Deft shall not possess a firearm; deft shall perform 25 hours of community service; deft shall make full financial disclosure to the probation dept. The Court adopts the factual findings &; guideline application in the presentence report &; addenda, except: paragraph 41-Hernia is substituted for ulcers. Paragraph 43-Dominquez H.S. is substituted for Compton H.S. Guideline Range Determined by the Court: TOL: 2; Criminal History Category: I; Imprisonment Range: 0 to 6 months; Probation Range: 1 to 3 years; Fine Range: $100.00 to $5,000.0 0; Fine is waived or is below the guideline range, because of the deft's inability to pay. The sentence is within the guideline range, that range does not exceed 24 months, &; the court finds no reason to depart from the sentence called for by ap plication of the guidelines. It is ordered that the deft shall pay to the US a special assessment of $200.00.

charges.charge_description: 49:1155(b); 18:2 and 3551 et seq. Defendants did knowingly intentionally and without authority remove, conceal and withhold parts of a civil aricraft involved in an accident and removed property on the aircraft at the time of the accident. (Following citation used since system did not accept the prior citation) 49A:1472F.F DIVULGING INFORMATION (2)

charges.charge_description: 18:371.F and 3551 et seq. CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft James Sanders was found guilty on counts 1,2 after a plea of not guilty. The deft is hereby placed on probation for a term of 3 years on counts 1,2 concurrent. Special Conditions of Probation: Deft shall not possess a firearm. Deft shall perform 50 hours of community service; Deft shall make full financial disclsoure to the probation dept. The Court adopts the factual findings &; guideline application in the presentence report &; addenda, except: paragraph 21-Court finds that no adjustment for obstruction of justice is warranted. Paragraph 22-adjusted offense level is reduced to 6 as a result. Paragraph 29-the deft is now elegible for a 2 level adjustment for acceptance of responsibility. Paragraph 30-the TOL is reduced to 4 as a result. Guideline Range Determined by the Court: TOL: 4; Criminal History Category: I; Imprisonment Range: 0 to 6 months; Probation Range: 1 to 3 years; Fine Range: $250.00 to $5,000.00; Fine is waived or is below the guideline range, beca use of the deft's inability to pay. The sentence is within the guideline range, that range does not exceed 24 months, &; the Court finds no reason to depart from the sentence called for by application of the guideline. It is ordered that the deft shall pay to the US a special assessment of $200.00.
